tool.help:
Prepare a table for further analysis.
Configure a table to have first two columns of id's and the rest with values. The output could be several tables depending on number of data categorys of input table.
To facilitate we recommend you open your table in excel and add a row above your current header. After that you could define a new name for each sample. Then you can select the range with the new names and copy them. When you paste to the "Samples name" field (after check the "Change samples name" cehckbox) you only have to change the tabs that divides the names with commas and you are done. You can repeat the same process to change classes name.
